name: Hexa Puzzle Pro
description:
The goal of the game is to create one or more red endless bands with as few moves as possible, and to create as many levels as possible.

At the beginning there is a playing field with 4 x 4 hexagon fields with a red band.

Tap MIX to mix the hex fields. The possible points to be reached are displayed. By tapping on one of the hexagon fields, the Fled rotates 1 / 6th turn to the right. Each time you tap, the possible number of points is reduced by one.

If one or more red ribbons are reached, the result can be entered into a leaderboard (if it is one of your six best games) and the next level is started.
